bibl.title: Menander's Perikeiromene and Demetrios Poliorketes.
bibl.note: The play's setting in Corinth and the siege scene in Act 3 (especially 482-484) strongly suggest that Menander alludes to the period of Demetrios Poliorketes' attacks against Corinth. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 78 (2009) No. 3336.
bibl.seg: Dixon Michael D., Menander's Perikeiromene and Demetrios Poliorketes.

The play's setting in Corinth and the siege scene in Act 3 (especially 482-484) strongly suggest that Menander alludes to the period of Demetrios Poliorketes' attacks against Corinth. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 78 (2009) No. 3336.
